      • saveDenseMatrix

        public static void saveDenseMatrix(Matrix A,
                                   java.lang.String filePath)
        Write a dense matrix into a text file. Each line corresponds to a row with the format "%.8g\t%.8g\t%.8g\t... \t%.8g".
        Parameters:
        A - a dense matrix
        filePath - file path to write a dense matrix into

      • saveDenseMatrix

        public static void saveDenseMatrix(java.lang.String filePath,
                                   Matrix A)
        Write a dense matrix into a text file. Each line corresponds to a row with the format "%.8g\t%.8g\t%.8g\t... \t%.8g".
        Parameters:
        filePath - file path to write a dense matrix into
        A - a dense matrix

      • saveSparseMatrix

        public static void saveSparseMatrix(Matrix A,
                                    java.lang.String filePath)
        Write a sparse matrix into a text file. Each line corresponds to a non-zero entry (rowIdx, colIdx, value) with the format "%d %d %.8g".
        Parameters:
        A - a sparse matrix
        filePath - file path to write a sparse matrix into

      • saveSparseMatrix

        public static void saveSparseMatrix(java.lang.String filePath,
                                    Matrix A)
        Write a sparse matrix into a text file. Each line corresponds to a non-zero entry (rowIdx, colIdx, value) with the format "%d %d %.8g".
        Parameters:
        A - a sparse matrix
        filePath - file path to write a sparse matrix into

      • loadMatrix

        public static Matrix loadMatrix(java.lang.String filePath)
        Read a matrix from a text file. Sparseness will be automatically detected.
        Parameters:
        filePath - file path to read a matrix from
        Returns:
        a real matrix

      • loadDenseMatrix

        public static DenseMatrix loadDenseMatrix(java.lang.String filePath)
        Read a dense matrix from a text file. Each line corresponds to a row with the format "%.8g\t%.8g\t%.8g\t... \t%.8g".
        Parameters:
        filePath - file path to read a dense matrix from
        Returns:
        a dense matrix

      • loadSparseMatrix

        public static SparseMatrix loadSparseMatrix(java.lang.String filePath)
        Load a Matrix from a text file.
        Parameters:
        filePath - a String specifying the location of the text file holding matrix data. Each line is an entry with the format (without double quotes) "(rowIdx,[whitespace]colIdx):[whitespace]value". rowIdx and colIdx start from 1 as in MATLAB
        Returns:
        a sparse matrix

      • loadMatrixFromDocTermCountFile

        public static SparseMatrix loadMatrixFromDocTermCountFile(java.lang.String docTermCountFilePath)
        Load a Matrix from a doc-term-count file located at String docTermCountFilePath.
        Parameters:
        docTermCountFilePath - a String specifying the location of the doc-term-count file holding matrix data. Each line is an entry with the format (docID,[whitespace]featureID):[whitespace]value". docID and featureID start from 1
        Returns:
        a sparse matrix

      • docTermCountArray2Matrix

        public static Matrix docTermCountArray2Matrix(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.TreeMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Integer>> docTermCountArray)
        Convert a docTermCountArray instance of type {code ArrayList>} from the TextProcessor package to a SparseMatrix instance.
        Parameters:
        docTermCountArray - input where each element in the ArrayList is termID-count TreeMap representation for a document
        Returns:
        a sparse matrix
